basic.Peptide Name: L-amino-acid oxidase (Bm-LAO; LAAO; LAO; Snakes, reptiles, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis strain ATCC 6633 (MIC=32 µM), Enterococcus faecalis strain ATCC 12953 (MIC=32 µM), Staphylococcus aureus strain ATCC 29213 (MIC=32 µM), Streptococcus pyogenes strain ATCC 19615 (MIC=8 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli strain ATCC 8739 (MIC=4 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniaee strain ATCC 13885 (MIC=2 µM), Proteus mirabilis strain ATCC 25933 (MIC=2 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa strain ATCC 15442 (MIC=8 µM), Salmonella typhimurium strain ATCC 14028 (MIC=8 µM).
